hook.text: A 400 sq ft apartment in central Paris costs $500,000. The average French salary would take 20 years to buy it.

buildup.text: Paris has strict building height limits and historic preservation laws that prevent new supply.

discovery.text: The city hasn't allowed a skyscraper since the Montparnasse Tower backlash of 1973. Supply is frozen.

quiz.question: Why is Paris housing so expensive?
options: Height limits and historic preservation restrict supply
